Writer: Joel Coen (screenplay), Ethan Coen (screenplay), Charles Portis (novel)
Title: True Grit
Actors: Jeff Bridges, Hailee Steinfeld, Matt Damon, Josh Brolin
Plot: A stubborn teenager enlists the help of a tough U.S. Marshal to track down her father's murderer.
Awards: Nominated for 10 Oscars. Another 37 wins & 153 nominations.
